input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Gold Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our gold 8mm Stainless Steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for both casual and formal occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 4mm Round Box'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Link Gold Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 2.5mm Rope'
  - Name='JAXXON 3.5mm White Gold Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm White Gold Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm JX1 Automatic Watch + Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON Youth Cuban + Rope Silver Chain Stack'
  - Name='JAXXON Micro Studded Cross'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Silver Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Women's Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Figaro'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 20" White Gold Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Women's Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Gold Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 18"/20" Gold Choker Rope Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm White Gold Franco Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm White Gold Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Figaro Gold Chain'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link chain design but different thickness (10mm vs 8mm) and silver color instead of gold.
Round box chain is a different chain style and thinner, less similar in construction and silhouette.
Same Cuban link style and gold color, but it's a bracelet and smaller gauge (3mm vs 8mm).
Rope chain is a different chain style and much thinner, less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 3.5mm White Gold Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link chain design but thinner gauge and white gold instead of standard gold.
Same Cuban link design and gold color, but smaller gauge (5mm vs 8mm) and set format.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 3mm White Gold Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link chain in white gold and thinner size, less similar in thickness and color tone.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm JX1 Automatic Watch + Cuban Link
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes an 8mm Cuban link chain but coupled with an automatic watch, thus different product bundle.
Same Cuban link style but as a bracelet, generally smaller in length and different wear style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Youth Cuban + Rope Silver Chain Stack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes Cuban and rope chains but in silver and stacked for youth, less similar in specifics.
Not a chain but a studded cross accessory, completely different product type.
Same Cuban link style, silver color, 5mm thickness, fairly relevant but different material tone and smaller gauge.
Same Cuban link style in gold, targeted for women and as a set, relevant but may differ in sizing or style nuances.
Figaro is a different chain style despite similar sizing, less relevant to Cuban link chain.
Same Cuban style at 5mm thickness, set format less specific but quite relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 20" White Gold Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link chain design with gold material (white gold) and similar functional attributes, only difference is color tone and specific length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Women's Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link gold chain styled with iced out embellishment, very similar in base product with added decorative features.
Same Cuban link gold chains but thicker gauge (10mm vs 8mm) and set format.
Rope chain is a different chain style, gold color is similar but design and silhouette differ greatly.
Franco chain is a different style and thinner gauge with white gold color, less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm White Gold Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link design, white gold color, smaller 5mm gauge, moderately relevant.
Same Cuban link design in silver material, similar function and style aside from color.
Figaro is a distinctive chain style different from Cuban link, less relevant despite gold color.
